law.catch_line: Notification of board of any criminal conviction.
law.text: Any person under the jurisdiction of the board shall, within ninety (90) days of entry of an order or judgment, notify the board in writing of any misdemeanor or felony criminal conviction, except traffic-related misdemeanors other than operating a motor vehicle under the influence of drugs or alcohol, in this or any other jurisdiction. The person shall submit a certified or attested copy of the order and a letter of explanation.
law.history: Amended 2015 Ky. Acts ch. 117, sec. 16, effective June 24, 2015. -- Amended 2010 Ky. Acts ch. 85, sec. 61, effective July 15, 2010. -- Amended 2008 Ky. Acts ch. 99, sec. 5, effective July 15, 2008. -- Amended 2004 Ky. Acts ch. 55, sec. 11, effective July 13, 2004. -- Created 2000 Ky. Acts ch. 391, sec. 5, effective July 14, 2000.
